title: Education-Program
details: Aligned with the UN Convention on the Rights of the Child, KCCBSSA is committed to upholding children's fundamental right to free and compulsory primary education. Our Education Program focuses on enhancing access to quality educational services, ensuring that every child can benefit from a solid foundation in learning.
two_detail: To achieve this, we offer a range of services, including:
bullet_points: Free Kindergarten Services: We provide early childhood education for children aged 4 to 6 from low-income families in Addis Ababa and Debre Birhan, ensuring they receive essential schooling, meals, and school supplies.
Sponsorship Programs: We offer monthly financial support to school-aged children and youth, enabling them to continue their education without financial barriers.
Support for School Dropouts: We provide capacity-building initiatives, including vocational and short-term training programs, to help school dropouts gain employable skills.

Teacher Training and Resources: Our commitment extends to training educators and supplying scholastic materials and school fees for orphans and vulnerable children, ensuring a supportive learning environment.
two_more_detail: Through these initiatives, KCCBSSA is dedicated to creating a brighter future for children, fostering their growth and development in a nurturing educational setting.
